content: with all the snow and cold there is also a longing for sun grass and flowers so i added a bit of summer in the snowflake the frizzy daisy snowflake based on 6-petal flower shape and is very easy to make it even easier i created a free blocking snowflake template for you to use **snowflake blocking template** https //crochetfrog com/tools/snowflake-blocking-template/ apart from a regular pattern i have written a tutorial for absolute beginners without abbreviations and avoiding crochet terminology
